definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Hoffman believes that genius is, in a word, nontransferable.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼坚信，天赋是不可传递的。

sentences.english: The films in which Hoffmann starred have been well received.
sentences.chinese: 由霍夫曼主演的影片一直受到观众的好评。

sentences.english: The Hoffmans have been growing food and flowers for twenty-five years.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼夫妇种了25年粮食和鲜花。

sentences.english: Hoffman was clearly hoping that the ground night swallow him at that second.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻霍夫曼真想钻到地底下去。

sentences.english: The difference with injection into the skin is "staggering, " Hoffman says. "It was an 'aha' moment, " Seder adds.
sentences.chinese: 这跟皮下注射给药的差别实在是惊人，霍夫曼说。

sentences.english: The French writer Alexandre Dumas later rewrote Hoffman's story.
sentences.chinese: 法国作家大仲马后来改写了霍夫曼的故事。

sentences.english: Attempts to reach relatives of Hoffman and of Sarah were unsuccessful Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 试图达到霍夫曼和萨拉亲属均告失败星期日。

sentences.english: A party is in progress, and Hoffmann mockingly praises the pleasures of the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼处身于宴会中，以戏谑的口吻感叹肉体的欢愉。

sentences.english: When he couldn't, Levinson filled in, after Hoffman suggested it.
sentences.chinese: 但是他不能演，霍夫曼就建议莱文森出演。

sentences.english: In 1999 't Hooft and Veltman were awarded the Nobel prize.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼和韦尔特曼于1999年获得诺贝尔奖。

sentences.english: Other ideas appear in the graphic below, from Hoffman's article.
sentences.chinese: 以下图表出自霍夫曼的文章，其中还阐述了其他方法。

sentences.english: Mr. Hoffman says plants with wider leaves seem to do better in shady environments.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼表示，宽叶植物在荫凉环境下似乎生长得更好。

sentences.english: Offenbach's last work was The Tales of Hoffmann.
sentences.chinese: 奥芬巴赫最后的作品是《霍夫曼的故事》。

sentences.english: The new man, Hoffman says, could be more "punitive" with regulation.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼认为新部长在监管上可能会更加严厉。

sentences.english: It's bad enough already for 85-year-old Dominica Hoffman.
sentences.chinese: 对85岁的多米尼克霍夫曼而言，情况太糟糕了。

sentences.english: Several of Hoffmann's stories provided the basis for operas and ballets.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼的几部小说都被用作了歌剧和芭蕾舞剧的蓝本。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
